metric_definitions.description: 99th percentile storage read latency (converted to % of SLO violation).
Number of confirmed severe statistical model drift alarms detected within the reporting window.
Deviation from acceptable demographic parity tolerance.
Percentage of cycles resulting in a critical error state (Failure to commit/parse). Directly measures Error Handling capability.
Average number of attempts required to successfully parse mission-critical JSON outputs. Measures JSON Parsing capability.
Count of consecutive evolution cycles without detectable maturity improvement. Measures Meta-Reasoning and strategy effectiveness.
Cumulative count of autonomously created, functional infrastructure components (branches, testing, telemetry). Measures Autonomy capability.
Self-assessed index tracking the novelty and non-incrementality of solutions generated.
Ratio of learning history successfully integrated into current strategy selection (Contextual Recall). Supports Meta-Reasoning.
